/* SA012011.selectListSA012011 */ SELECT A.SALEID , A.DEPOSITDATE , B.SALEDATE , B.SALEGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '007', B.SALEGUBUN) AS SALEGUBUNNAME , B.SALERCD , B.CONNAME , B.CONPY , C.SALEAMT , C.DCAMT , C.SELLAMT , C.AGENCYAMT , D.CITYCODE , fn_codename('03', D.CITYCODE, NULL) AS CITYNAME , D.BOROUGHCODE , (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = D.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = D.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME , D.ADDRESS , E.KNAME , E.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', E.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS BRANCHNAME , E.DEPTCODE , fn_codename('05', E.DEPTCODE, NULL) AS DEPTNAME , (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE DEPTCODE = E.DEPTCODE AND GRADE = '007' AND DUTY = '002' LIMIT 1) AS MNGRNAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND DEPOSITYN = 'Y') A INNER JOIN sa_salemst B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_saledtl C ON B.SALEID = C.SALEID INNER JOIN mm_buymst D ON B.BUYID = D.BUYID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst E ON B.SALERCD = E.INSACODE WHERE A.SALEID NOT IN (SELECT SALEID FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE CHGGUBUN = '004')
AND A.DEPOSITDATE BETWEEN #S_DEPOSITDATE_FR# AND #S_DEPOSITDATE_TO#
AND B.SALEGUBUN = #S_SALEGUBUN#
AND E.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND E.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND E.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
ORDER BY B.SALEDATE DESC
